channel.title: competition on ErbaZZ's Space
channel.description: Recent content in competition on ErbaZZ's Space

item.title: [Writeup] Hacking Contest 2019 (Qualification Round)
item.description: Yesterday, I got a chance to participate in the qualification round of competition called “Hacking Contest 2019” held by SOSECURE and MFEC. It is claimed to be a hacking competition with the largest prize pool in Thailand. Posters Once again, I was participating with my team “!IsCaptured” (Dawit Chusetthagarn, Patipon Suwanbon, and I), the same one from the previous competition. (Financial Cybersecurity Bootcamp 2018) Qualification Round The qualification round is an 18-hour long competition, from 18.

item.title: [Writeup] Financial Cybersecurity Bootcamp 2018
item.description: In August, I had a chance to participate in an online CTF competition called Financial Cybersecurity Bootcamp 2018, which is a jeopardy style competition with the time limit of 24 hours. Together with my team, !IsCaptured, we solved 4 of the challenges and became eligible to participate in the final round.
